title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Haaram
features: A delicate diamond-studded vine motif leads to a graduated sequence of emeralds interlinked with floral diamond clusters. The pendant-style drop showcases a central emerald framed by a diamond halo. This is a modern interpretation of the classic Haaram, blending traditional motifs with contemporary design.
description: Exquisite blend of traditional and modern aesthetics. High-quality emeralds with vibrant color and excellent clarity. Intricate diamond setting for maximum brilliance. Perfect for the modern woman who appreciates timeless elegance with a touch of contemporary flair. Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees lasting quality.
